body_html: @stephenroller: Cool, I'll leave this open as contributions welcome, but based on Vijay's comments it would have to be a unified op to reduce races. The GPU scatter and gather kernels are reasonably clean, so it wouldn't be too hard to mimic them.
body_text: @stephenroller: Cool, I'll leave this open as contributions welcome, but based on Vijay's comments it would have to be a unified op to reduce races.  The GPU scatter and gather kernels are reasonably clean, so it wouldn't be too hard to mimic them.
body: @stephenroller: Cool, I'll leave this open as contributions welcome, but based on Vijay's comments it would have to be a unified op to reduce races.  The GPU scatter and gather kernels are reasonably clean, so it wouldn't be too hard to mimic them.
